Privacy Policy
 Last updated: October 28, 2024


This policy outlines our practices for collecting, using, and sharing your information when you use this app. By using the app, you agree to these practices.


For the full privacy policy, visit:
 https://www.bestpickbp.com/privacy-policy


Compliance with Google Play Policies
 We adhere to Google’s policies to ensure data security, content standards, and privacy.


Permissions and Data Collected
 We may request permissions for:
 - Camera: For taking photos or videos.
 - Location: For location-based services.
 - Storage: For saving and accessing files.

 Data collected includes:
 - Personal Data: Name, email, and contact info.
 - Usage Data: Device and app usage information.


Use and Sharing of Information
 We use data to improve app features, personalize experiences, and send updates. Data may be shared with trusted partners and service providers.


Security and Retention
 We use reasonable security measures to protect data and retain it only as needed.


Children’s Privacy
 We do not collect data from children under 13.


Contact Us
 For questions, contact us at bestpick050@gmail.com.
